item.description: A get together to have dinner, and conversation for planning future events. Discussion topics for group interests. Check out the message board for some event ideas. There are two Zabagliones, they are both right around the corner from each other. We are meeting at the one at 1 Market Street.
item.how_to_find_us: It's a small place, you should recognize my welcoming smile when you walk in.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: New Group Meet and Greet Dinner
